Forms Contact Us Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Financial Aid>Types of Aid>Assistantships Assistantships Some graduate departments within DePaul's colleges and schools offer assistantships. These positions generally require administrative work within the department in exchange for tuition waivers of varying amounts. For information on availability of positions, application requirements and waiver amounts, contact the department in which you intend to enroll. Departments by College/School: Driehaus College of Business & Kellstadt Graduate School of Business College of Communication Jarvis College of Computing and Digital Media College of Education College of Law College of Liberal Arts and Social Sciences College of Science and Health School of Continuing and Professional Studies School of Music The Theatre School
